registry.title: OAuth Dynamic Client Registration Metadata
registry.note: Registration requests should be sent to the mailing list described in .

record.description: Array of redirection URIs for use in redirect-based flows
Requested authentication method for the token endpoint
Array of OAuth 2.0 grant types that the client may use
Array of the OAuth 2.0 response types that the client may use
Human-readable name of the client to be presented to the user
URL of a web page providing information about the client
URL that references a logo for the client
Space-separated list of OAuth 2.0 scope values
Array of strings representing ways to contact people responsible for this client, typically email addresses
URL that points to a human-readable terms of service document for the client
URL that points to a human-readable policy document for the client
URL referencing the client's JSON Web Key Set document representing the client's public keys
Client's JSON Web Key Set document representing the client's public keys
Identifier for the software that comprises a client
Version identifier for the software that comprises a client
Client identifier
Client secret
Time at which the client identifier was issued
Time at which the client secret will expire
OAuth 2.0 Bearer Token used to access the client configuration endpoint
Fully qualified URI of the client registration endpoint
Kind of the application -- "native" or "web"
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: URL using the https scheme to be used in calculating Pseudonymous Identifiers by the OP

record.description: subject_type requested for responses to this Client -- "pairwise" or "public"
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: JWS alg algorithm REQUIRED for signing the ID Token issued to this Client

record.description: JWS alg algorithm that MUST be used for signing Request Objects sent to the OP
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: JWE alg algorithm the RP is declaring that it may use for encrypting Request Objects sent to the OP
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: JWE enc algorithm the RP is declaring that it may use for encrypting Request Objects sent to the OP

record.description: JWS alg algorithm that MUST be used for signing the JWT used to authenticate the Client at the Token Endpoint for the private_key_jwt and client_secret_jwt authentication methods
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: Default Maximum Authentication Age
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the auth_time Claim in the ID Token is REQUIRED
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: Default requested Authentication Context Class Reference values
record.xref: OpenID Connect Dynamic Client Registration 1.0 incorporating errata set 2

record.description: URI using the https scheme that a third party can use to initiate a login by the RP

record.description: Array of request_uri values that are pre-registered by the RP for use at the OP

record.description: claims redirection endpoints
JWS alg algorithm required for signing the nfv Token issued to this Client
JWE alg algorithm required for encrypting the nfv Token issued to this Client
JWE enc algorithm required for encrypting the nfv Token issued to this Client
Indicates the client's intention to use mutual-TLS client certificate-bound access tokens.
String value specifying the expected subject DN of the client certificate.
String value specifying the expected dNSName SAN entry in the client certificate.
String value specifying the expected uniformResourceIdentifier SAN entry in the client certificate.
String value specifying the expected iPAddress SAN entry in the client certificate.
String value specifying the expected rfc822Name SAN entry in the client certificate.
Indicates where authorization request needs to be protected as Request Object and provided through either request or request_uri parameter.
Indicates whether the client is required to use PAR to initiate authorization requests.
String value indicating the client's desired introspection response signing algorithm.
String value specifying the desired introspection response content key encryption algorithm (alg value).
String value specifying the desired introspection response content encryption algorithm (enc value).
RP URL that will cause the RP to log itself out when rendered in an iframe by the OP
Boolean value specifying whether the RP requires that a sid (session ID) query parameter be included to identify the RP session with the OP when the frontchannel_logout_uri is used
RP URL that will cause the RP to log itself out when sent a Logout Token by the OP
Boolean value specifying whether the RP requires that a sid (session ID) Claim be included in the Logout Token to identify the RP session with the OP when the backchannel_logout_uri is used
Array of URLs supplied by the RP to which it MAY request that the End-User's User Agent be redirected using the post_logout_redirect_uri parameter after a logout has been performed

registry.title: OAuth Token Introspection Response
registry.note: Registration requests should be sent to the mailing list described in .

record.description: Token active status
User identifier of the resource owner
Client identifier of the client
Authorized scopes of the token
Type of the token
Expiration timestamp of the token
Issuance timestamp of the token
Timestamp which the token is not valid before
Subject of the token
Audience of the token
Issuer of the token
Unique identifier of the token
array of objects, each describing a scoped, time-limitable permission for a resource
Vector of Trust value
Vector of Trust trustmark URL
Actor
Authorized Actor - the party that is authorized to become the actor
Confirmation
The ACE profile used between the client and RS.
"client-nonce". A nonce previously provided to the AS by the RS via the client. Used to verify token freshness when the RS cannot synchronize its clock with the AS.
"CWT ID". The identifier of a CWT as defined in .
"Expires in". Lifetime of the token in seconds from the time the RS first sees it. Used to implement a weaker form of token expiration for devices that cannot synchronize their internal clocks.

registry.title: OAuth Authorization Server Metadata
registry.expert: Michael Jones, Nat Sakimura, John Bradley, Dick Hardt
registry.note: Registration requests should be sent to the mailing list described in .

record.name: issuer
record.description: Authorization server's issuer identifier URL

record.name: authorization_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's authorization endpoint

record.name: token_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's token endpoint

record.name: jwks_uri
record.description: URL of the authorization server's JWK Set document

record.name: registration_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's OAuth 2.0 Dynamic Client Registration Endpoint

record.name: scopes_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the OAuth 2.0 "scope" values that this authorization server supports

record.name: response_types_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the OAuth 2.0 "response_type" values that this authorization server supports

record.name: response_modes_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the OAuth 2.0 "response_mode" values that this authorization server supports

record.name: grant_types_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the OAuth 2.0 grant type values that this authorization server supports

record.name: token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of client authentication methods supported by this token endpoint

record.name: token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms supported by the token endpoint for the signature on the JWT used to authenticate the client at the token endpoint

record.name: service_documentation
record.description: URL of a page containing human-readable information that developers might want or need to know when using the authorization server

record.name: ui_locales_supported
record.description: Languages and scripts supported for the user interface, represented as a JSON array of language tag values from BCP 47

record.name: op_policy_uri
record.description: URL that the authorization server provides to the person registering the client to read about the authorization server's requirements on how the client can use the data provided by the authorization server

record.name: op_tos_uri
record.description: URL that the authorization server provides to the person registering the client to read about the authorization server's terms of service

record.name: revocation_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's OAuth 2.0 revocation endpoint

record.name: revocation_endpoint_auth_methods_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of client authentication methods supported by this revocation endpoint

record.name: revocation_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms supported by the revocation endpoint for the signature on the JWT used to authenticate the client at the revocation endpoint

record.name: introspection_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's OAuth 2.0 introspection endpoint

record.name: introspection_endpoint_auth_methods_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of client authentication methods supported by this introspection endpoint

record.name: introspection_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms supported by the introspection endpoint for the signature on the JWT used to authenticate the client at the introspection endpoint

record.name: code_challenge_methods_supported
record.description: PKCE code challenge methods supported by this authorization server

record.name: signed_metadata
record.description: Signed JWT containing metadata values about the authorization server as claims

record.name: device_authorization_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's device authorization endpoint

record.name: tls_client_certificate_bound_access_tokens
record.description: Indicates authorization server support for mutual-TLS client certificate-bound access tokens.

record.name: mtls_endpoint_aliases
record.description: JSON object containing alternative authorization server endpoints, which a client intending to do mutual TLS will use in preference to the conventional endpoints.

record.name: nfv_token_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms supported by the server for signing the JWT used as NFV Token

record.name: nfv_token_encryption_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) supported by the server to encode the JWT used as NFV Token

record.name: nfv_token_encryption_enc_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) supported by the server to encode the JWT used as NFV Token

record.name: userinfo_endpoint
record.description: URL of the OP's UserInfo Endpoint

record.name: acr_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the Authentication Context Class References that this OP supports

record.name: subject_types_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the Subject Identifier types that this OP supports

record.name: id_token_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS "alg" values supported by the OP for the ID Token

record.name: id_token_encryption_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE "alg" values supported by the OP for the ID Token

record.name: id_token_encryption_enc_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE "enc" values supported by the OP for the ID Token

record.name: userinfo_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS "alg" values supported by the UserInfo Endpoint

record.name: userinfo_encryption_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE "alg" values supported by the UserInfo Endpoint

record.name: userinfo_encryption_enc_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE "enc" values supported by the UserInfo Endpoint

record.name: request_object_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWS "alg" values supported by the OP for Request Objects

record.name: request_object_encryption_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE "alg" values supported by the OP for Request Objects

record.name: request_object_encryption_enc_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the JWE "enc" values supported by the OP for Request Objects

record.name: display_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the "display" parameter values that the OpenID Provider supports

record.name: claim_types_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the Claim Types that the OpenID Provider supports

record.name: claims_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of the Claim Names of the Claims that the OpenID Provider MAY be able to supply values for

record.name: claims_locales_supported
record.description: Languages and scripts supported for values in Claims being returned, represented as a JSON array of BCP 47 language tag values

record.name: claims_parameter_supported
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports use of the "claims" parameter

record.name: request_parameter_supported
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports use of the "request" parameter

record.name: request_uri_parameter_supported
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports use of the "request_uri" parameter

record.name: require_request_uri_registration
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP requires any "request_uri" values used to be pre-registered

record.name: require_signed_request_object
record.description: Indicates where authorization request needs to be protected as Request Object and provided through either request or request_uri parameter.

record.name: pushed_authorization_request_endpoint
record.description: URL of the authorization server's pushed authorization request endpoint

record.name: require_pushed_authorization_requests
record.description: Indicates whether the authorization server accepts authorization requests only via PAR.

record.name: introspection_signing_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of algorithms supported by the authorization server for introspection response signing.

record.name: introspection_encryption_alg_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of algorithms supported by the authorization server for introspection response content key encryption (alg value).

record.name: introspection_encryption_enc_values_supported
record.description: JSON array containing a list of algorithms supported by the authorization server for introspection response content encryption (enc value).

record.name: authorization_response_iss_parameter_supported
record.description: Boolean value indicating whether the authorization server provides the iss parameter in the authorization response.

record.name: check_session_iframe
record.description: URL of an OP iframe that supports cross-origin communications for session state information with the RP Client, using the HTML5 postMessage API

record.name: frontchannel_logout_supported
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports HTTP-based logout, with true indicating support

record.name: backchannel_logout_supported
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP supports back-channel logout, with true indicating support

record.name: backchannel_logout_session_supported
record.description: Boolean value specifying whether the OP can pass a sid (session ID) Claim in the Logout Token to identify the RP session with the OP

record.name: end_session_endpoint
record.description: URL at the OP to which an RP can perform a redirect to request that the End-User be logged out at the OP

person.name: Kantara Initiative User-Managed Access Work Group
OpenID Foundation Artifact Binding Working Group
